sentences.sContent: Perhaps there’ll be 16GB telephoto or 32GB zoom lenses available in the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: Perhaps there’ll be 16GB telephoto or 32GB zoom lenses available in the future.
sentences.sCn: 或许今后还会有16GB的“摄远镜头”或32GB的“全景镜头”可供选择。

sentences.sContent: One limiting factor is the viewing angle, which is comparable to using a camera lens: a telephoto lens has a narrower view than a wide-angle lens.
sentences.sContent_eng: One limiting factor is the viewing angle, which is comparable to using a camera lens: a telephoto lens has a narrower view than a wide-angle lens.
sentences.sCn: 限制因素之一就是观察角度，这与使用照相机的情况类似：长焦镜头的视野比广角镜头的观察角度要窄得多。

synos.tran: 传真照片；传真电报；摄远镜头

phrases.pCn: 远距镜头；长焦镜头；望远透镜

remMethod.val: tele(远) ＋ photo(照片) → 从远处传过来的照片 → 传真照片

words.tran: 望远镜的；[眼科] 远视的；套管式伸缩的；眼力好的；有先见之明的
[摄] 远距离照相术；[通信] 传真电报术
[通信] 电传打字机，电传打字电报机

trans.tranCn: 传真照片；传真电报；摄远镜头
用远距镜头照相的；摄远的
